channel.title: Slides on Robert Howton
channel.description: Recent content in Slides on Robert Howton

item.title: Unit 0.1
item.description:
Introducing Modern Philosophy Why devote a course in the history of Western European philosophy to the 
th{17} and 
th{18} centuries? The reason may not be obvious. For one thing, philosophy in Europe is far \emph{older} than the 
th{17} century; it stretches at least as far back as the ancient Greeks in the 
th{6} century CE, perhaps even further, finding its ultimate roots in the speculations of ancient Egyptians and Babylonians centuries before.
